Text:
ABSOLUTELY works....you just have to do a little digging:

First, you need HDTVPump:

http://www.dvbportal.de/projects/hdtvpump/

And then (At least for any HD-DVD releases by HDTV_CHINA i have) you need Matroska Splitter

http://haali.cs.msu.ru/mkv/

You will also need to have a MPEG2 decoder previously installed. NVIDIA's works. If you can play a DVD - chances are you have a valid decoder.

Install those and report back!

I've done everything listed nothing.  I've viewed HDTV China's releases before so I don't think they are MPAA fakes, but every tool I've used says there is no MPEG2 Stream like an MPAA fake.  I've tried 2k, XP, OSX, media player classic, vlc, wmp11+sdk, video Redo, NOTHING plays any video.  The link for codec downloads fails to complete.  
IF the codec works, please include it in the torrent.  Thanks.
have same problem and i can play all the other releses from HDTV China but no this one, DL a Bluray verson to check if that functions

@hurrafor

thnx! getting both sound and images.

only problem is that video is lagging after sound
but that may be because of my comp hardware
which is about 3 years old.

!!NOTE!! I installed FinalCodecs and suddenly the sound was gone in the movie =\\

uninstalled FinalCodecs and reinstalled HDTVPump and Matroska but no go =~(

SUGGESTION: start with HDTVPump and Matroska.
if you get image and sound then DON'T install the FinalCodecs pack.
I installed HDTV pump, Matroska Splitter and NVidia  . I can hear the audio but I cannot see the video . Any assistance will be highly appreciated.
KMPlayer to play HD from HDTV CHINA
